attributes.title: ABSOLUTELY AWFUL
attributes.review: words cannot express how much i hate this app. Every time i would open it it would crash. Now maybe.... that’s bc of the presence of a rapist sexist racist homophobic man 🥱🙈🙀😻🙉🤨🤍. but i have no idea that just might be me anyways!!! this app is super stinky and my 6 year old cousin could desgin a better one. get this app off the app store immediately😈😈😈😈 that’s it have a good day!

attributes.title: Worst app
attributes.review: This is yet the worst app I’ve gotten! Like I came here and the first thing I see is him degrading women and all kind of stuff! Then the main screen comes up with vote for trump! If u vote for him we will send an immigrant back to Mexico (like if all Hispanics are from there) and not only that but it shows a nude of him with his tiny 🍆, is that appropriate to have?!?!! This is ridiculous!!!

attributes.title: no thanks❤️
attributes.review: Listen, my favorite show of all time is Scandal right? This show is about fixers in Washington, D.C. who happen to have a close relationship with the president, Fitzgerald Grant. I hate Fitzgerald Grant. With a passion. But you know what? I hate this app more. It made me love Fitzgerald Grant. So following that logic, this app OBVIOUSLY isn’t for me and I’m guessing it not for anyone else either! So, I guess all I have to say is no❤️

attributes.title: Unsafe and disgusting app 🤮
attributes.review: Aside from being greeted with gross images of pornography as soon as i opened the app, of pictures of Donald Trump himself, the app has caused my phone over 42 viruses! Also with this, I got a notification from the app calling me a dirty c***s*cker who “belongs to the streets.” While my child was using the app, it malfunctioned and opened up an add for an adult website. This app is unsafe and disgusts me.

attributes.title: HORRIBLE
attributes.review: The moment I opened the app I was greeted with an Ompaa Lompaa trying to force feed me a cookie!🍪 I tried uninstalling the app but the all of a sudden random cookie monsters kept popping up all over my screen! 😱 I even bought a whole NEW phone 📱 but the SAME problem kept accruing?! 🤯 Since this event I have had to change my ENTRIE identify to stop 🛑 it from continuing!

attributes.title: ABSOLUTELY TRAUMATIZED🙈😳🤬😡
attributes.review: So I got this app to pay respects to my beloved 😇𝒸𝒽ℯℯ𝓉ℴ𝒽 𝓂𝒶𝓃😇 i was expecting glorious photos of the immaculate man himself! But instead pictures containing graphic images such as his nakey fat figure COVERED in cheetah dust!! Absolutely traumatizing!! 😳🤮 i mean he’s racist, homophobic, sexist and orange! Like pick a struggle 👿👿 anyways 10/10 DO NOT RECCOMEND! especially with small children in your household (please spare their innocent eyes)! Hoped this helped! ✨𝓣𝓸𝓸𝓭𝓵𝓮𝓼!✨💋💅🏼

attributes.title: Do not recommend
attributes.review: I opened the page and saw a Cheeto IImmediately went blind and my eyes had to be removed and got new ones  then I passed out for 365 days and know I’m better but I go to therapy each sec to get the trama that I experience during this moment when I saw the Cheetos mini crosont hanging during getting a spray tan I’m still healing to this day prayers are appreciated.

attributes.title: completely inappropriate
attributes.review: i opened the app and my cat literally jumped up and ran out of my room at the sight of the orange baboon on the screen! my cat thought he was under attack because of the malicious look on the baboon’s face. i had to keep my phone away for the rest of the night and comfort my poor baby. shame on the designers of the app. my cat probably has PTSD!!!!

attributes.title: Donald J Trump is your president till 2024
attributes.review: This is a great app shows how well this president does and what good he has done this mad will Win this year everything aside this is a great app I love it and most importantly TRUMP 2020.

attributes.title: Ew just no. Delete it 🤢
attributes.review:
I don’t want this Cheeto puff of a president app on the App Store. It doesn’t deserve to be here. We do not Stan a man whos inappropriate and gross in general. Apple please delete this app, if a president is gonna delete TikTok, his app doesn’t deserve to be here at all. Why is he worrying about tiktok in the first place? He needs to be worrying about how to fix the virus and racism in this world 😤 
Thank you and goodbye 🌝
